text: The canton of Saint-Quentin-1 is an administrative division of the Aisne department, in northern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Saint- Quentin.Décret n° 2014-202 du 21 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de l'Aisne It consists of the following communes: #Attilly #Beauvois-en-Vermandois #Caulaincourt #Douchy #Étreillers #Fayet #Fluquières #Foreste #Francilly-Selency #Germaine #Gricourt #Holnon #Jeancourt #Lanchy #Maissemy #Pontru #Pontruet #Roupy #Saint-Quentin (partly) #Savy #Trefcon #Vaux-en-Vermandois #Vendelles #Le Verguier #Vermand ==References== Category:Cantons of Aisne
title: Canton of Saint-Quentin-1
